TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed Collation extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定印表機在列印多頁列印工作的多個複本時是否將輸出自動分頁。

span.span: Specifies whether a printer collates output when it prints multiple copies of a multi-page print job.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 標準的印表機通常會自動輸出分頁所列印的第一個複本，每一頁，則每一頁的第二個複本，依此類推。A standard printer typically collates output by printing every page of the first copy, then every page of the second copy, and so on. 當標準印表機不自動分頁時，它會列印第一頁，每一份則每個複製的第二個頁面上，依此類推。When a standard printer does not collate, it prints every copy of the first page, then every copy of the second page, and so on. 某些印表機是特別配備有定序分類收納。這些特定配備的印表機的列印順序可能與不同標準印表機。不過結果會相同： 多重分頁的列印工作的每一份包含其所有依照正確順序排列的頁面而不需要手動排序。Some printers are specially equipped with collating bins. The printing sequence for these specially equipped printers may differ from those of standard printers; however the outcome is the same: each copy of a multi-paged print job contains all its pages in the proper sequence without manual sorting. 主要是用於下列用途使用此類型的值。Use the values of this type primarily for the following purposes. - 為成員集合，其屬性的，這些值會指出的印表機支援的輸出類型。As members of the collection, which is a property of , these values indicate the type of output that the printer supports. （許多印表機支援這兩種類型）。(Many printers support both types.) - 值為屬性，值會指示印表機是否要自動分頁。As the value of the property of a , the value instructs the printer whether to collate. **未知**屬性中不會使用值物件。The **Unknown** value is never used in properties of objects. 您應該永遠不會設定屬性**未知**。You should never set a property to **Unknown**. 如果其他產生應用程式已建立*PrintTicket 文件*，會將設定定序功能無法辨識的定序選項，則建構應用程式中的物件該文件會有**未知**做為值屬性。If some other producing application has created a *PrintTicket document* that sets the collation feature to an unrecognized collation option, then a object in your application that is constructed with that document will have **Unknown** as the value of the property. 雖然和類別無法被繼承，您可以擴充[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)辨識不計算中的列印裝置功能或類別。Although the and classes cannot be inherited, you can extend the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) to recognize print device features that are not accounted for in the or classes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NOTINBUILD： 如何： 列印結構描述和建立新的列印系統類別擴充](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885)。For more information see [NOTINBUILD: How to: Extend the Print Schema and Create New Print System Classes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885). ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何測試印表機的功能，以及設定要使用這些列印工作。The following example shows how to test a printer's capabilities and configure a print job to take advantage of them. 。. [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#printercapabilities)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#printercapabilities)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#printercapabilities)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.Collation Collated = int32(1)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.Collation Uncollated = int32(2)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.Collation Unknown = int32(0)

summary.span: 功能 (其選項由這個列舉表示) 設定的選項並未在[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)中定義。

span.span: The feature (whose options are represented by this enumeration) is set to an option not defined in the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).
